Lore Ai | Mid/Senior Engineers | Paris or Washington DC (ONSITE)| Full-Time | Competitive Salary + equity | https://www.lore.ai

At Lore we're excited about building intelligent systems that sit at the heart of an enterprise, organizing and extending its knowledge. To do this we've developed Salient, a scalable platform combining document management, knowledge graphs and machine learning.

We're a small, early-stage company (profitable and revenue-funded) and we're looking for strong developers who want to get in on the ground floor and play a significant role in the direction of our company. You will work closely with the founding team (all technical and very experienced) to help us solve complex architectural challenges and develop new ML approaches to address our customers' problems.

Our stack is a distributed ML/document analysis system, developed in-house, using Python (Celery, Mongo, ES, MySQL, Minio, Kubernetes) for the backend and JS/Django for the front-end. You can learn more in this PyParis talk (https://youtu.be/9T7-C-XSwkA).

Perks include equity, the chance to grow with(in) the company, travel between Paris and DC, flexible home/office work, and lots of learning opportunities from a team that has been doing ML for years.

Roles:

- Full stack developer (JS/python front-end)

- Backend/ML Engineer (python, distributed systems, ML)

Please visit www.lore.ai/careers.html or email careers@lore.ai and mention hackernews. No recruiters please.
